segments.text: wow , it that your sports car ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love it ! I used to always want to drive a green jaguar . Is it in good condition ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it looks good on the outside , but the inside is a different story . It needs a lot of servicing before it can go out on the roads again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , first of all , it needs a new engine , which is extremely expensive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: when's the last time you had it serviced ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it must have been a few years ago now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought all cars needed regular servicing on a yearly basis .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: they do . Once my son was born , there was no reason to drive this car anymore . It's only a two-seater , you know !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what else is wrong with it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: the heating controls don't work anymore , so it always feels like it's about 100 degrees in the car — even in the summer !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: the brakes don't really work that well anymore either .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: why don't you get it all fixed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it costs more than you think to run a car , especially when there are so many things wrong with it !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , let me know when you can get it fixed . I ’ d love to go for a ride in it !
segments.speaker: S1
